full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 164 of 228 840 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct did you see her go? A. She went through the kitchen, I will introduce her to Ms. Maxwell at her desk, and that's it. That's as far as I saw her going to. She talked to Ms. Maxwell. From then, I was -- that was not my job to see where they were. Q. During the time that you worked for Mr. Epstein, who, if anyone, would tell you about Mr. Epstein's upcoming travel plans? A. Either Ms. Maxwell, sometimes the secretaries from the office. If I remember correctly, was Fiona secretary, also Kimberly, a secretary from New York, and sometimes the pilots told me, "We're on our way and we have to rush." Q. Other than Jane, what was the name of the other female who appeared to be underage that you remember seeing at Mr. Epstein's house? A. The other young person that I saw there was Virginia Roberts. Q. How did you first come to see Virginia Roberts? A. I saw Virginia Roberts at Mar-a-Lago one afternoon with Ms. Maxwell -- Q. Let me stop you there. What were you doing at Mar-a-Lago with Ms. Maxwell? A. She went to check the spa. She went to see the spa at Mar-a-Lago. Q. What had you and Ms. Maxwell been doing that day? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018037
